document_data.name: Garagai
document_data.mainbody: '''Garagai''' was a [[frost giant]] who lived in an ice lodge on the tundra of [[Icewind Dale]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: While he did not hold the title of [[jarl]], Garagai was well-respected among his kin. He regularly invited other frost giants to his home for good company.
document_data.Relationships: He had two [[winter wolf]] allies, [[Koran]] and [[Kanan]], and an ''[[awaken]]ed'' [[mammoth]] companion named [[Norsu]].
document_data.History:
Around the {{yearlinkName|1488}}, Garagai was slain by a group of [[adventurer]]s.

Garagai's animal allies began a campaign of terror and revenge on the settlement of [[Dougan's Hole]] in the year that followed. The wolves lured residents of the town to the giant's abandoned lodge, where they were killed in an act of vengeance by Norsu.
